Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires motor vehicle lease contracts to include provisions related to the accumulation of mileage
Summary: Requires motor vehicle lease contracts to include provisions related to the accumulation of mileage, specifically the amount a lessee will receive back if such lessee does not accumulate all miles that were allotted for the term of the lease.
LawCode: Amd ยง337, Pers Prop L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the personal property law, in relation to requiring motor vehicle lease contracts to include provisions related to the accumulation of mileage
